raw: UPDATE 2-Abu Dhabi to raise $3 billion with April bonds re-opening .
replaced: UPDATE The emirate to raise $3 billion with April bonds re-opening .

raw: By Davide Barbuscia and Yousef Saba DUBAI , May 19 ( Reuters ) -
replaced: By Davide Barbuscia and Yousef Saba DUBAI , May 19 ( Reuters ) -

raw: Abu Dhabi is set to raise $ 3 billion with a tap of dollar bonds issued last month , a document showed , as governments in the Gulf seek extra cash amid the coronavirus pandemic and a slump in oil prices .
replaced: The emirate is set to raise $ 3 billion with a tap of dollar bonds issued last month , a document showed , as governments in the Gulf seek extra cash amid the coronavirus pandemic and a slump in oil prices .

raw: Oil - rich Abu Dhabi issued in April $ 7 billion in bonds due in 2025 , 2030 and 2050 , just after a jumbo $ 10 billion bond sale by Qatar .
replaced: The emirate issued in April $ 7 billion in bonds due in 2025 , 2030 and 2050 , just after The deal .

raw: Considered among the best credits in the region , Abu Dhabi , the capital of the United Arab Emirates , received around $ 45 billion in orders for the April deal .
replaced: Considered among the best credits in the region , The emirate received around $ 45 billion in orders for The deal  April deal .

raw: It has now gone back to the markets with a bond tap , where an existing transaction is reopened for subscription using the same documentation as before .
replaced: The emirate has now gone back to the markets with a bond tap , where an existing transaction is reopened for subscription using the same documentation as before .

raw: It is set to raise $ 3 billion more , according to a document issued by one of the banks leading the deal and seen by Reuters .
replaced: The emirate is set to raise $ 3 billion more , according to a document issued by one of the banks leading the deal and seen by Reuters  The deal and seen by Reuters .

raw: The deal has attracted over $ 20 billion in orders .
replaced: The deal has attracted over $ 20 billion in orders .

raw: The emirate is offering around 140 basis points over U.S. Treasuries for bonds due in 2025 , around 155 bps over the same benchmark for a tranche due in 2030 , and around 3.3 % for the notes due in 2050 , according to the document .
replaced: The emirate is offering around 140 basis points over U.S. Treasuries for bonds due in 2025 , around 155 bps over the same benchmark for a tranche due in 2030 , and around 3.3 % for the notes due in 2050 , according to a document issued by one of the banks leading the deal and seen by Reuters .

raw: “ As expected , the pricing is in line with the earlier tranche , ” a Dubai - based fixed income strategist said .
replaced: “ As expected , the pricing is in line with the earlier tranche , ” a Dubai - based fixed income strategist said .

raw: “ The interesting point to note is there is no skew in demand towards the 30 - year bonds , unlike in April , when investors clearly preferred the long end .
replaced: “ The interesting point to note is there is no skew in demand towards the 30 - year bonds , unlike in April , when investors clearly this the long end .

raw: We believe high dollar price might one of the reasons for this , ” he said .
replaced: We believe high dollar price might one of the reasons for this , ” a Dubai - based fixed income strategist said .

raw: The proceeds of the sale , which will close later on Tuesday , will be used for “ general budgetary purposes , ” a separate bank document showed .
replaced: The proceeds of The deal will be used for “ general budgetary purposes , ” a separate bank document showed .

raw: A spokesman at Abu Dhabi ’s department of finance did not respond to a request for comment .
replaced: A spokesman at Abu Dhabi ’s department of finance did not respond to a request for comment .

raw: BNP Paribas , First Abu Dhabi Bank , JPMorgan and Standard Chartered were hired to arrange the deal .
replaced: BNP Paribas , First Abu Dhabi Bank , JPMorgan and Standard Chartered were hired to arrange The deal .
